content: I've just opened std4#492 and found out that I have no permission to mark it awaiting-review. Could someone please give me this permission and/or add the label to the PR?

you can comment with awaiting-review and it should be auto marked.

That said it is not passing CI so I'm not sure if it is ready for review^^
Sorry, didn't adjust for Std4 coding style.
Yury G. Kudryashov has marked this topic as resolved.
